alert.note: Alert for Bee (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 8:29AM CDT until May 16 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Aransas River Near Skidmore affecting Bee County. For the Aransas River...including Skidmore...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Aransas River Near Skidmore. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Major lowland flooding occurs. Crops are damaged and pastureland is flooded in the Poesta and Aransas Creek flood plains upstream. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this morning to 15.7 feet late this morning. It will then fall briefly and begin rising again late this afternoon. It will rise to 19.3 feet late tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Aransas River Skidmore 13.0 7.7 Sat 8 am 19.1 13.0 4.0 1.2 0.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
